name: Quadratic puzzle 3
description:
Introduction to the game

The main goal of the game is based on jigsaw puzzles, which need to splice the disrupted fragments into the appropriate parts. When all are completed, they will be graded according to the time used. The scoring grade is divided into "SS", "S", "A", "B", "C" and "D". Special CG content can also be unlocked whenever the score is "S" or "SS".

game features

The pictures spliced in the game are very cute animation beauty images. Compared with the previous two "rectangular puzzle 3", a scoring system and special CG content are added.
